head.title: Paid Notice: Deaths GRIFFIN, HELEN J.

hedline.hl1: Paid Notice: Deaths GRIFFIN, HELEN J.

block.p: GRIFFIN--Helen J. on January 9, 2007. Beloved wife of the late James J. Griffin, Sr., loving mother of James J. Griffin, Jr. and Meg Griffin. Dear grandmother of Lauren, James J. III and Knoah; devoted great-grandmother of Griffin and Anna. Memorial Mass on Friday, January 19, 2007, 10am, St. Bernard's Church, White Plains.
